description: The Biomateriales initiative, launched in late 2024, focuses on repurposing waste products from the Central restaurant to create innovative alternatives for consumers. Led by a dedicated team, the project aims to maximize resource use and reduce waste while providing unique culinary experiences. By utilizing local ingredients, such as cocoa husks, the initiative emphasizes sustainability and community engagement, showcasing a commitment to environmental responsibility and culinary innovation.
name: Biomateriales
